tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hydropower_reservoirs (
  reservoir_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reservoir_name VARCHAR(50),
  water_level DECIMAL(10,2),
  electricity_production DECIMAL(15,2)
)

CREATE TABLE ElectricityProduction (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reservoir_id INT,
    production_date DATE,
    electricity_output DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (reservoir_id) REFERENCES HydropowerReservoir(reservoir_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reservoir_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (reservoir_id) REFERENCES HydropowerReservoir(reservoir_id)
);

CREATE TABLE HydropowerReservoirs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reservoir_name VARCHAR(50),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    water_flow_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE ElectricityProduction (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reservoir_id INT,
    production_date DATE,
    total_production DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reservoir_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DamSafety (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reservoir_id INT,
    safety_inspection_date DATE,
    safety_rating VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherForecast (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reservoir_id INT,
    forecast_date DATE,
    weather_conditions VARCHAR(50)
)
